shot noun
(SPORT)
B2 [ C ] a kick, hit, or throw of the ball that is intended to score points in a sport such as cricket, football, tennis, or golf: And that was a great shot by Márquez! Murray drove a forehand shot down the line to win the match.
More examplesFewer examplesHe scored with a cracking shot into the back of the goal.The crowd cheered as the goalkeeper deflected the shot.His angled shot beat the goalkeeper from 20 yards.He feinted a shot to the left.Vilas misdirected the shot, and the ball went over the net.
